A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is one of those movies that was entertaining to watch\, but once it was over and I had time to think through the story... it got really bad. You can look around on the net and find the 1000's of things wrong with this and why it is anything but a Star Wars flick. Really sad to have it all end this way when we were still on cloud nine from The Force Awakens.
